Reminder about our 2009 exhibition

Hi all,

Our annual exhibition is still on for this year, so put the following dates into your calendar!

  • Sunday 7th June 10am toÂ 6pm

We’re hosting it at the same venue as last year - for more information, head to the Exhibitions page.
